# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, we're offering it to you at a special introductory price of $95. This is an excellent opportunity to experience the benefits of our product at a discounted rate compared to its usual value of $100. We're confident it will meet and exceed your expectations. Please let us know if you're interested in taking advantage of this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer
